name: Bewitched Potatoes
description:
A stubborn witch lives in a shack far away from society. She produces her own materials to use in potions but it takes a lot of time. So, she bargains with the devil. The devil makes her crops grow faster but the situation gets out of control and the crops turns into zombies. The stubborn witch has to protect her shack from the terrible zombie potato horde.

Protect your shack. Harvest the souls of zombie potatoes and use them to regrow your own bewitched potatoes. Don’t let your bewitched potatoes go to waste!
